layout.title: KEMO Collection | Pointlessly Awesome
layout.description: A collection of completely unrelated and possibly useless tools. Enter at your own risk.

quotes: Using this app may cause existential dread
Warning: May contain traces of actual functionality
Built by developers who should know better
KEMO: Because someone had to make this monstrosity
Abandon hope, all ye who enter here
Your code is too clean, try making it worse
Warning: Your UI is too conventional

footer.built_with: Built with questionable decisions and zero practical purpose.
messages: Why are you clicking on a footer? Seriously?
Fine. Keep clicking. See if I care.
I bet you're the type who reads EULAs for fun.

home.intro: This is a carefully curated collection of completely useless tools that somehow managed to escape the recycle bin. Browse at your own risk. Side effects may include confusion, laughter, and questioning why you're wasting your time here.
home.disclaimer: None of these tools were tested or built with any purpose in mind. If you find any actual utility in them, please contact a doctor immediately as you may be experiencing delusions.

random_picker.title: Random Picker
random_picker.description: Can't decide between terrible options? Let us decide for you! (Spoiler: All options are terrible.)

cryptic_generator.title: Cryptic Generator
cryptic_generator.description: Generate mysterious texts that even you won't understand. Perfect for pretending you're smarter than you are.

youtube_summarizer.title: YouTube Channel Summarizer
youtube_summarizer.description: Why waste time watching every video? Let AI analyze entire YouTube channels and tell you what content creators are up to.

ai_narrative_battle.title: AI Narrative Battle
ai_narrative_battle.description: Watch two AIs fight to the death in a pointless grid war. It's like chess, if chess made no sense and was narrated by a drunk poet.

cryptic_generator_tool.title: Cryptic Text Generator (Making Simple Things Complicated)
cryptic_generator_tool.description: Turn your boring text into something so cryptic even you won't understand it. Perfect for pretending you're smarter than you actually are.

output.title: Your Text, But Worse
output.placeholder: Your cryptic text will appear here, assuming the cosmic forces align properly...

random_picker_tool.title: Random Decision Maker (Because You Can't Decide)
random_picker_tool.description: Can't make up your mind? Let our completely biased algorithm decide for you! Warning: We take no responsibility for the consequences.

input.empty_message: Add some options first (yes, more than one)

result.title: The Algorithm Has Spoken
result.disclaimer: Remember: This decision was made by a computer that doesn't care about your life choices.

validation.duplicate: This option already exists (be more creative)
validation.empty: Empty options are not very helpful
validation.max_reached: That's enough options. You're just making this harder.

youtube_summarizer_tool.title: YouTube Channel Analyzer (I'm Not Even Supposed to Be Here)
youtube_summarizer_tool.description: Who needs actual content when you can stare at numbers? Drop a URL and I'll tell you why their subscriber count is sus. 🧐

input.placeholder: Paste that YouTube channel URL here...

loading_messages: Checking if they're better than PewDiePie... 🤔
